import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row'; import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col'; import '../css/editRequest.css'; function EditRequest() { //dummy data object const request = { id: Date.now(), dateCreated: "09/01/2021", dateAwarded: "", demographics: { firstname: "Philip", lastname: "Smith", phone: "111-111-1111", email: "phil.smith@revature.net" }, event: { eventType: "Graduation", cost: 500, gradingFormat: "Letter", gradeCutOff: "D", location: "Remote", startDate: "25/01/2021", endDate: "25/01/2021", description: "My graduation, yay!" }, justification: "It is expensive.", attachments: "None", requestInfo: "", resubmitInfo: "", rejectInfo: "", statusOf: "Requested" }; return (

Tuition Reimbursement Form
Today's Date First Name Last Name Phone Number Email Event Type Cost Projected Reimbursement Location Start Date End Date Grading Format Grade Cut Off Justification Event Description More Information Request Enter More Information
); } export default EditRequest;
